attributes.action: Cover the cost of Hair & Beauty Salons overheads, the £1340 doesn’t cover us
attributes.additional_details:
I have built up a salon business over 10 years and I fear if we don’t get help soon I won’t be able to keep the salon running.
Like myself there are thousands in the same situation, forced to close without a lifeline.
We’ve lost so much business due to social distancing and add on this latest lockdown, we’re drowning and need help.
attributes.background:
At present we have received £1340 per month to stay closed, my own salon bills per month are over £2200, how can we survive if we can’t even have the basic bills covered whilst we’re closed, many salons won’t reopen due to rising debt caused by COVID-19 lockdown rules.
We need more help urgently.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/554500.
